name: Persepolis The Game
description:
This game is based on the graphic novel Persepolis and was created to raise awareness about the current situation happening in Iran. 

How to play:

Use the arrow keys to move around

Press e to open the door

During the game, you will be presented with some of the choices that the main character in Persepolis (Marji), was faced with during the Iranian revolution.  In the end, the game will tell you how many wrong choices you made. 

In the second part of the game, you need to collect 3 objects each symbolic of an aspect of the current revolution in Iran. To collect this you can jump on balconies and cars.
